-- | Isomorphisms and prisms for text <=> bytestring conversions
--   
@package lens-text-encoding
@version 0.1.0.0

module Data.Text.Encoding.Lens
class Encodable t where type family Encoded t
utf8 :: Encodable t => Iso' t (Encoded t)
utf16LE :: Encodable t => Iso' t (Encoded t)
utf16BE :: Encodable t => Iso' t (Encoded t)
utf32LE :: Encodable t => Iso' t (Encoded t)
utf32BE :: Encodable t => Iso' t (Encoded t)
instance Encodable Text
instance Encodable Text
